content: प्रमाणीकृ {c8c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To confide, believe. {@--2@} To hold or regard as an authority; शासनं तरुभिरपि प्रमाणीकृतं <ls>Ś. 6.</ls> {@--3@} To fix upon, dispense, deal or meet out; दैवेन प्रभुणा स्वयं जगति यद्यस्य प्रमाणीकृतं <ls>Bh. 2. 121.</ls> {@--4@} To obey, conform to. {@--5@} To prove, to establish. {@--6@} To consult, take the consent of; <ls>Ku. 6. 1.</ls> {@--7@} To take into account; <ls>U. 7. 5.</ls>
